name: The Hidden Oasis
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Hidden Oasis presents a 250 sqm reception room with large glass windows that open on to the terrace allowing for a magical view of the garden while dining. The room has a capacity of 200 persons and offers a dancing area. The cocktail reception can be organized on the terrace near the bar. The space also presents a cloakroom, bathrooms and a private room for the bride so that she can change during the party. Behind the main reception room, there is a big catering kitchen and a cold room which have a private access to the service providers’ parking lot.
Our team can recommend a quality catering service and a list of other trusted vendors (photographers, DJ, decoration, musicians, etc...).
A car park of 150/200 parking spaces is at your disposal inside the property.
You can rent the property either during the week* or for the week-end**, for one or several days. It is possible to organize a nice brunch the day after your wedding at a discounted price so that you can enjoy the garden.
Our prices vary according to the day of the week and the number of people. Chairs and tables for all interior and exterior spaces are included in the price.
Please, do not hesitate to call us for a personalized quotation, we would be happy to help you organize your wedding!
Price for the one day in the week, Monday to Thursday: 2500€ for less than 130 people, 3500€ for more than 130.
Price for Friday: 3000€ for less than 130 people, 4000€ for more than 130
Price for Saturday: 4500€ for less than 130 people, 5000€ for more than 130
**Price for the weekend: 6000€ for less than 130 people, 7000€ for more than 130
additional_info:

Hotel recommendation list
